channel.title: Allstar Base - 317 - NPC idea
channel.description:
i wud like to have a boss that when it dies it spawns other NPCs and start attacking. and when they all died the boss can spawn. also if its delta or PI or something else please try to change it to my base.
And try like write TELECOORD X and stuff in the code so i know what to put, if i need the coords x and y. Thanks //Leo
